init_hook: bash -lc 'SOLR_BIN_REAL="$(readlink -f "$(command -v solr)")"; SOLR_DIST="$(dirname "$(dirname "$SOLR_BIN_REAL")")"; if [ ! -f "$SOLR_HOME/solr.xml" ]; then cp "$SOLR_DIST/server/solr/solr.xml" "$SOLR_HOME/solr.xml"; cp "$SOLR_DIST/server/solr/zoo.cfg" "$SOLR_HOME/zoo.cfg"; cp -R "$SOLR_DIST/server/solr/configsets" "$SOLR_HOME/configsets"; fi; chmod -R u+rwX "$SOLR_HOME" "$SOLR_LOGS_DIR" "$SOLR_PID_DIR"'

scripts.deps: bash -lc 'RBIN="$PWD/.devbox/virtenv/ruby/bin"; export PATH="$RBIN:$PWD/.devbox/nix/profile/default/bin:$PATH"; "$RBIN/gem" install -N bundler -v "$BUNDLER_VERSION" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; "$RBIN/bundle" install; yarn install'
scripts.postgres-ensure:
bash -c '
set -e
mkdir -p "$PGDATA" "$PGHOST"
pg_isready -h "$PGHOST" -p "$PGPORT" >/dev/null 2>&1 && exit 0
PIDFILE="$PGDATA/postmaster.pid"
if [ -f "$PIDFILE" ]; then
  PID=$(head -1 "$PIDFILE" || true)
  if [ -n "$PID" ] && ! kill -0 "$PID" 2>/dev/null; then
    rm -f "$PIDFILE"
  fi
fi
pg_ctl -D "$PGDATA" -l "$PWD/.postgres/postgres.log" -o "-p $PGPORT -k $PGHOST -c listen_addresses=" start
for i in $(seq 1 50); do
  pg_isready -h "$PGHOST" -p "$PGPORT" >/dev/null 2>&1 && exit 0
  sleep 0.1
done
echo "Postgres did not become ready" >&2
tail -200 "$PWD/.postgres/postgres.log" || true
exit 1
'
scripts.db-create: devbox run postgres-ensure >/dev/null && $PWD/.devbox/virtenv/ruby/bin/bundle exec rails db:create
scripts.db-migrate: devbox run postgres-ensure >/dev/null && $PWD/.devbox/virtenv/ruby/bin/bundle exec rails db:migrate
scripts.solr-status: bash -c 'OS=$(uname -s); EXTRA=""; if [ "$OS" != "Darwin" ]; then EXTRA="-XX:-UseContainerSupport"; fi; JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS="-Dlog4j2.disable.jmx=true -Dsolr.disable.jmx=true $EXTRA" solr status -p "$SOLR_PORT" || true; ss -ltn 2>/dev/null | grep ":$SOLR_PORT" || true'
scripts.solr-start: bash -c 'set -e; OS=$(uname -s); EXTRA=""; if [ "$OS" != "Darwin" ]; then EXTRA="-XX:-UseContainerSupport"; fi; if [ "$OS" = "Darwin" ]; then env -u JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS="-Dlog4j2.disable.jmx=true -Dsolr.disable.jmx=true" solr start -cloud -p "$SOLR_PORT" -s "$SOLR_HOME" -a "$SOLR_OPTS"; else JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS="-Dlog4j2.disable.jmx=true -Dsolr.disable.jmx=true $EXTRA" solr start -cloud -p "$SOLR_PORT" -s "$SOLR_HOME" -a "$SOLR_OPTS $EXTRA"; fi'
scripts.solr-stop: bash -c 'OS=$(uname -s); if [ "$OS" = "Darwin" ]; then env -u JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS solr stop -p "$SOLR_PORT" || true; else solr stop -p "$SOLR_PORT" || true; fi'
scripts.solr-assert-cloud: bash -c 'mode=$(curl -fsS "http://$SOLR_HOST:$SOLR_PORT/solr/admin/info/system?wt=json" | ruby -rjson -e "j=JSON.parse(STDIN.read); puts j[\"mode\"]"); test "$mode" = "solrcloud" || { echo "Expected solrcloud mode, got $mode" >&2; exit 1; }'
scripts.solr-create-test-collection: bash -c 'curl -H "Content-type: application/json" http://solr:SolrRocks@$SOLR_HOST:$SOLR_PORT/api/collections/ -d "{create: {name: pdc_discovery-core-test, config: pdc_discovery, numShards: 1}}"'
